alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 25 at 3:19AM CST until January 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Iowa, southwest Minnesota, northeast Nebraska, and central, east central, south central, and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of drizzle are also possible. Temperatures have fallen to near or below freezing, resulting in untreated roads becoming slippery.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
